span.p: The Canton Local Tech Team are opening office hours on the following dates and times:

Utilization of the Help Desk is preferred but we know that there are items that will need to be physically repaired. Please enter through Door 2 at Canton South High School. Please check back for updated dates and times.
Ohio Governor DeWine’s mandate: All Ohio school buildings will remain closed and remote learning will continue through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.

span.a: Update 4/27/2020: Click here - New remote learning guidelines for Fourth Marking Period

span.p: Notice: The Canton Local Schools Board of Education has moved the date of its regular May meeting to Monday, May 18, 2020. Posted 4/17/2020

NEW OPEN ENROLLMENT APPLICATION PROCESS opens tentatively on May 4, 2020. New Open Enrollment applications will be accepted throughout the month of May 2020 (tentatively) but it is a first-come, first-serve basis.
(Tentatively) We will open at 8:00 AM, ONLY ONE legal parent or guardian to attend, no students, please. Bring with you a photo ID, proof of residency, and any court or school documents applicable.
There is no guarantee for Open Enrollment seats. Availability depends upon class size and other availability of services needed. Preschool does NOT accept Open Enrollment. Click for more details
Registration will be BY APPOINTMENT ONLY beginning May 4 (tentative). Please call 330-484-8019 for an appointment to register your student for the 2020-2021 school year.

ONLY ONE legal parent/guardian permitted, please do not bring your students with you. Packets can be mailed or arranged for pick up. Complete the documentation at home and bring the forms and proper documentation with you to your appointment. Again, please call for both information pick-up and appointment times. Click for a list of documents needed.
